wikipedia_page.main:
John Morison (c.1757 – 12 February 1835) was a British politician  who sat in the House of Commons from 1827 to 1832.
In 1827, Morison was elected as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Banffshire, Scotland. He held the seat until 1832. He was also known as John of Auchintoul.

response: * John Morison (Canadian politician) (1818–1873), Canadian businessman and political figure
* John Morison (Banffshire MP) (c. 1757–1835), British MP for Banffshire
* John Morison (pastor) (sometimes spelled Morrison, 1791–1859), Congregational minister, London
